overview: Women Seeking Women lives up to its AVN award for best All-Girl Series by delivering again beautiful women in some of the most realistic, sensual, erotic situations imaginable. Bridgette B. and Rebeca Linares turn up the heat to red hot for a mind-blowing performance that will leave you with the agonizing wish of WANTING to be there when it all unfolds!
tagline: Restless Hearts Searching For That One Perfect Woman
title: Women Seeking Women 48
